metadata.title: CVE-2019-12439 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: bubblewrap.c in Bubblewrap before 0.3.3 misuses temporary directories in/tmp as a mount point. In some particular configurations (related toXDG_RUNTIME_DIR), a local attacker may abuse this flaw to prevent otherusers from executing bubblewrap or potentially execute code.

criterions.comment: bubblewrap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
